attacks.name: Tentacle
attacks.description: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {DC:CON} Constitution saving throw or become diseased. The disease has no effect for 1 minute and can be removed by any magic that cures disease. After 1 minute, the diseased creature's skin becomes translucent and slimy, the creature can't regain hit points unless it is underwater, and the disease can be removed only by heal or another disease-curing spell of 6th level or higher. When the creature is outside a body of water, it takes {1d12} acid damage every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The {NAME} can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Mucous Cloud
traits.description: While underwater, the {NAME} is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must make a {DC:CON} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is diseased for 1d4 hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

traits.name: Probing Telepathy
traits.description: If a creature communicates telepathically with the {NAME}, the {NAME} learns the creature's greatest desires if the {NAME} can see the creature.

actions.name: Enslave
actions.description:
The {NAME} targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {DC:WIS} Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed by the {NAME} until the {NAME} dies or until it is on a different plane of existence from the target. The charmed target is under the {NAME}'s control and can't take reactions, and the {NAME} and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance.

Whenever the charmed target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the saving throw when it is at least 1 mile away from the {NAME}.

actions.name: Psychic Drain
actions.description: One creature charmed by the {NAME} takes {3d6} psychic damage, and the {NAME} regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

lairActions.name: Phantasmal Force
lairActions.description: The {NAME} casts phantasmal force (no components required) on any number of creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. While maintaining concentration on this effect, the {NAME} can’t take other lair actions. If a target succeeds on the saving throw or if the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the {NAME}'s phantasmal force lair action for the next 24 hours, although such a creature can choose to be affected.

lairActions.name: Grasping Tide
lairActions.description: Pools of water within 90 feet of the {NAME} surge outward in a grasping tide. Any creature on the ground within 20 feet of such a pool must succeed on a {DC:CON} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 20 feet into the water and knocked prone. The {NAME} can’t use this lair action again until it has used a different one.

lairActions.name: Rage
lairActions.description: Water in the {NAME}'s lair magically becomes a conduit for the creature’s rage. The {NAME} can target any number of creatures it can see in such water within 90 feet of it. A target must succeed on a {DC:WIS} Wisdom saving throw or take {2d6} psychic damage. The {NAME} can’t use this lair action again until it has used a different one.
